projects.title: Credenz '15 Website
projects.description: A website designed and developed for the technical event of PICT IEEE Student Branch.

projects.title: Credenz '15 Live Center
projects.description: Live Center is a real time feed display web app. It displayed the current updates of every event occurring under Credenz during the 3 days of Event. It also featured a section for displaying the short-listed candidates of each competition. Each event co-ordinator had a login and could add updates on the go, which would reflect on the LIVE CENTER instantly.

projects.title: Credenz '15 Registrations
projects.description: The participant registration of CREDENZ '15 was handled by an Android App and A Web Application. The Participant details were input into the Android App and on submitting the request to the server all the data was stored on server and an Email Receipt and an SMS were sent to the participant. All the data was accessible to the Organizers through a User Friendly and feature rich Web Application.

projects.title: Impetus and Concepts Judging Management
projects.description: A system was developed to easily manage and monitor the Judging of Project Exibits in Impetus and Concepts - an annual Technical Event of Pune Institute of Computer Technology. It included a Web App for the Organisers to add judges, monitor projects being judged currently and have a central system to collect marks. The system alloted certain projects to judges based on the domains of expertise. Judge had an app login where he/she could read about the projects being exibited and select the one which he/she would like to visit.
